1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Type for data interpretation.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Data.Type.Judge.Interp
6  ( Interp (..),
7    InterpWord (..),
8    interp,
9  ) where
10
11import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base                        as B
12import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax                      as S
13import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Type.Judge.Judge       as D
14import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Data.Type.Judge.JudgeClass  as D
15
16-- | Data interpretation.
17data Interp = Interp
18    { interpWords :: [InterpWord]  -- ^ Sentence which interpret data.
19    , interpTerms :: [S.TermName]  -- ^ Terms in sentence.
20    } deriving (Show, Eq, Ord)
21
22-- | Component of data interpretation.
23data InterpWord
24    = InterpText String            -- ^ Constant part of interpretation.
25    | InterpTerm S.TermName        -- ^ Variable part of interpretation.
26    deriving (Show, Eq, Ord)
27
28instance D.GetTermNames Interp where
29    getTermNames = interpTerms
30
31instance B.MixEncode Interp where
32    mixEncode Interp { interpWords = xs } =
33        B.mixBracketS S.bracketInterp
34             $ B.mixJoin B.mix1 $ map B.mixEncode xs
35
36instance B.MixEncode InterpWord where
37    mixEncode (InterpText w) = B.mixString w
38    mixEncode (InterpTerm n) = D.termNameToMix n
39
40-- | Create data interpretation.
41interp :: [InterpWord] -> Interp
42interp ws = intp where
43    terms = B.unique $ B.mapMaybe getTermName ws
44    intp  = Interp { interpWords = ws
45                   , interpTerms = terms }
46
47getTermName :: InterpWord -> Maybe S.TermName
48getTermName (InterpTerm n) = Just n
49getTermName _              = Nothing
50
